00019 #ifndef XMLNODE_H_
00020 #define XMLNODE_H_
00021 
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <vector>
00024 #include <exception>
00025 #include <iostream>
00026 
00027 void iterateUntilDelimiter( std::string::const_iterator &iter );
00028 void iterateUntilNotDelimiter( std::string::const_iterator &iter );
00029 void iterateUntilCharFound( std::string::const_iterator &iter, char c );
00030 std::string getNextTag( std::string::const_iterator &iter );
00031 void getAttributes( std::vector<std::string>& attrib, std::string::const_iterator &iter );
00032 bool isWhiteSpace( char c );
00033 
00034 class XmlNode;
00035 class XmlNodeException;
00036 
00037 // TODO: better communication b/w data objects and XmlNodes
00038 class XmlNode
00039 {
00040    friend class XmlTree;
00041    
00042    public:
00043       XmlNode();
00044       XmlNode( std::string::const_iterator &iter, XmlNode* par );
00045       bool isLeaf() const;
00046       void printLeaves() const;
00047       void printParentTags() const;
00048       void getNodesWithTag( std::vector<XmlNode*> &nodes, const std::string &inTag );
00049       void getChildren( std::vector<XmlNode*>& v) const;
00050       const std::string& getTag() const;
00051       std::string getLeafText() const;
00052       void toXml( std::ostream& os, int indentLevel ) const;
00053       
00054    private:
00055       std::string tag;
00056       std::vector<std::string> attributes;
00057       XmlNode *parent;
00058       std::vector<XmlNode*> children;
00059       std::string leafText; // Only valid if node has no children.
00060       
00061       void initMembers();
00062       void addChild(XmlNode* child);
00063 };
00064 
00065 class XmlNodeException : public std::exception
00066 {
00067 public:
00068 
00069    virtual const char* what() const throw()
00070    {
00071       return std::string("XmlNode error: " + _err + "\n").c_str();
00072    }
00073 
00074    XmlNodeException( std::string message )
00075    {
00076       _err = message;
00077    }
00078 
00079    ~XmlNodeException() throw() {}
00080 
00081 private:
00082 
00083    std::string _err;
00084 };
00085 
00086 #endif /*XMLNODE_H_*/
